meanings.sent1: The emprize of climbing the mountain filled her with excitement.
meanings.sent2: Embarking on an emprize like skydiving requires courage and determination.
meanings.sent3: The emprize of trying a new food turned out to be a delicious adventure.
meanings.sent4: Facing the emprize of public speaking felt like conquering a great dragon.
meanings.sent5: The emprize of exploring the unknown depths of the ocean captivated their imagination.

meanings.definition: To undertake a daring or adventurous task
meanings.sent1: She decided to emprize the challenge of running a marathon.
meanings.sent2: They emprized the journey to discover hidden treasures in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: He emprized the task of learning a new language in just one month.
meanings.sent4: Emprizing the mission to save the endangered species felt like a noble quest.
meanings.sent5: The team emprized the difficult task of building a sustainable community from scratch.
